commit.message:
Fix finding reg-sets of call insn

2014-06-20  Tom de Vries  <tom@codesourcery.com>

	* final.c (collect_fn_hard_reg_usage): Add separate IOR_HARD_REG_SET for
	get_call_reg_set_usage.

From-SVN: r211841
